IncidentDef.label: Telvanni salt flower sprout
IncidentDef.letterText: It appears that a Telvanni botanist lost some seeds nearby, and now the flowers have sprouted! If you wait for the plants to grow, you'll be able to harvest elemental salts, a useful resource for anyone interested in Telvanni technology.

IncidentDef.label: Telvanni extract plant sprout
IncidentDef.letterText: It appears that a Telvanni botanist lost some seeds nearby, and now several plants have sprouted! If you wait for the plants to grow, you'll be able to harvest their extract, a useful resource for anyone interested in Telvanni technology.
